answers.answer: I'm with you! I have normal diabetes that flared up really bad when I got pregnant, I started taking insulin right away. My baby is considered big. In fact at our 29 week scan he was an estimated 2kg! but I am constantly reassured by my doctors and midwives that a natural birth is still possible as long as we continue to keep an eye on the diabetes. You just need to do the best you can with what you have. Everything will work out perfect in the end. The power of positive thinking! :)

I have GD to. I am 35+6. Had an ultrasound today and baby is measuring at around 39weeks. My Dr has said he will induce me at around 38 weeks because of bubs size. I expected it as my family have a strong diabetes history as well as large babies too... All good I get to meet my bug earlier than expected. :)I have kept my sugars in perfect range too, don't stress. You just do what you have to and look forward to the finish line, no matter how you cross it.

Ok im still confused sorry nd please dont judge I had intercourse with another person the day before my period but he didn't ejaculate the next day I got my period ended the 23rd yea it was a mistake but I had sex with my bf 3 days after my period came to find out im early in my pregnancy im scare its the other guy :'(

I also have gd and im very nervous so.far i.think ive been doing ok im 22w at 20w i got my scan and so far baby was measuring rite i.get my next us scan at 30w im nervous to find out that baby will be to.big i dont want to be induced it makes it so much more painful!
I have it. Im 34+4 my growth scans show him being normal. I have to take meds not that it really helps because honestly my sugars have been higher on it then off. Anyone else taking meds for it?
Thank god so far i.havent been put on meds just the diet

Its good to hear most of ya'll are doing well with gd its reassuring... i have a appointment at the diabetes clinic today so all questions or fears i have may be cleared up today and ive only got 41 days to go so hope goes well if i dont get induced but wldnt mind seeing my lil trooper earlier

question: Wondering who here also has gestational diabetes i just found out today im kinda worried shld i be or not really?? Im33 an 6 days and baby is big already if he gets ne bigger in the next 3 weeks ill have to be induced not happy feeling really sad right now :(
title: who is with me
